title: Process a Supplier Credit Memo for Shortage
description: A shipment was received with a shortage. The supplier has sent a credit memo for the missing items, which needs to be applied.

tasks.description: Retrieve the original purchase order that had the shortage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the PO and confirms the discrepancy details.

tasks.description: Receive the credit memo from the supplier and verify it matches the value of the shorted items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the credit amount is correct.

tasks.description: Apply the credit memo to the supplier's account in the accounting system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies the credit, reducing the amount owed to the supplier.
